oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sixty-pound guns in action

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; War; Soldiers; Artillery (Weaponry); Campaigns & battles
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sixty-pound guns in action at Vaux-Andigny, Aisne, October 17, 1918. This British long-range gun will send its projectiles 15,000 yards. Vaux-Andigny, Aisne, France. October 17, 1918. See "Catalogue of Official A. E. F. Photographs Taken by the Signal Corps, U. S. A." See also #30546-30571, 30573-30583.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: United States. Army. Signal Corps
